resources.string:
1. Fix recording length bug
\ 2. Major code cleanup
\ 3. Cleaner error handling
\ 4. Updated AdMob SDK
\ 5. Attempt to fix some crashes
\ 6. Attempt to fix sound device release
\ 
\ DISCLAIMER: This is beta software! May be buggy and force close on you! Author is aware and working on issues!
\
Unable to configure audio! Please check your sample rate settings and make sure your device is able to record at that rate!
Cannot record audio with current settings! Please check your sample rate settings and make sure your device is able to record at that rate!
Error writing recording! Please make sure your SD card has free space and is inserted and writable!
An error has occurred while recording! Please check your settings and make sure your device is able to record audio!
Recording started! Press power button to stop recording!
Invalid filename detected, please enter a new one
Unable to export, external media not available!
Unable to export, failed to create external music directory!
Unable to set recording as ringtone!
Unable to set recording as notification!
Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?
Screen will not dim or lock when recording
Screen will dim or lock when recording
Please consider showing ads to support the developer!
Recording sample rate is device dependent, if you have trouble recording try changing this.
Recording buffer size (bytes) is device dependent, if you have trouble recording try changing this.
Change the key to tune to
The degree that pitch is pulled towards
Number of notes in scale which pitch is shifted
Warp formant frequencies (can helps prevent chipmunk effect)
Blend between wet and dry signal

Graphics work courtesy of Peng X. Wang: http://pengxwang.com

How to Record and Play Back
\ 1. Press the 'Record Button' to begin recording
\ 2. Press the 'Record Button' again to stop recording
\ 3. Enter a recording name in the pop-up dialog
\ 4. Press the 'Recording Library' button to access your saved recordings
\ 5. Press any recording in your library to play it back
\ 
\ How to Share
\ 1. Press the 'Recording Library' button to access your saved recordings
\ 2. Long-press on any recording to bring up the context menu
\ 3. Share by email, or set recording as your ringtone
\ 
\ How to Change Settings
\ 1. Press the 'Menu Button' on your phone to bring up the menu
\ 2. Press the 'Pitch-Correction Settings' button to bring up sound settings
\ 
\ Problems Recording?
\ 1. Try changing the sample rate from the settings
\ 2. Try changing the buffer multiplier from the settings
\ 3. Try re-installing the application
\ 4. Send me an email with your problems/questions
\
